name: You Need To Take Your Pills
name_original: You Need To Take Your Pills
description:
I made this game to learn unity this game is shitpost don't take it seriously

How to play: If you collect 10 pills, you win. If you lose your sanity you will lose.

Controls:

      Move:

         W

      A  S  D

Flashlight: F

Sprint: Left Shift

Jump: Space

Lean: Q E

Pause: Esc P

Info: F1
